title: The Top 10 Most Iconic Cat Photos Of All Time
summary: The Final Words are a look back at some of the most iconic cat photos in history. This list includes the iconic photo of the famous Smashing photographer, Yves St. Laurent. The list includes a picture taken aboard the USS Hornet ship during the launch of the Gemini 2 mission. The image has been the subject of wild speculation and conspiracy theories since it was first published in 1972. Itâ€™s amazing how a simple photo can loom so large in the minds of so many.

content.compiledSource: const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("h2",null,"With that being said, we wanted to take a moment today to pay homage to the kitty-world by taking a look back at some of the most iconic cat photos in history."),mdx("h2",null,"Meet Smashing, The Photo Shaking Cat"),mdx("p",null,"We kick off the list with this classic image of the famous Smashing photographer, Yves St. Laurent. This feline photo-bomb has been making a splash for decades, and is still shared on social media today. It\u2019s amazing how a simple photo can loom so large in the minds of so many!"),mdx("h2",null,"A Small Step For Man\u2026But A Giant Leap For Cats"),mdx("p",null,"This image, which was taken aboard the USS Hornet ship during the launch of the Gemini 2 mission, has been the subject of wild speculation and conspiracy theories since it was first published in 1972. While it is now widely accepted that the photographer was taking a picture of his shipmate in a spacesuit, many have suggested that the suited figure is actually a cat. Why? Well, it\u2019s probably because the cat is more popular than the spacesuit! It\u2019s a great photograph, and it has left a lasting impression on the world."),mdx("h2",null,"Will The Real Mr. Bigglesworth Please Stand Up?"),mdx("p",null,"This photo, which was taken outside the home of the actor John Cleese, is often accompanied by a caption asking the reader to guess the name of the famous feline depicted in the photo. It\u2019s a great photo, and it features Mr. Bigglesworth, the feline companion of the iconic cartoon cat, Garfield. In fact, the photograph was taken during a time when Mr. Bigglesworth was still a kitten."),mdx("h2",null,"When Puss N\u2019 Boots Took Over The World"),mdx("p",null,"This whimsical black-and-white image may look like it was taken from the pages of a children\u2019s book, but it was actually taken during the production of the first ever James Bond film, Dr. No. The photograph shows a stray tomcat named Tinker who was brought on set as a companion for Sean Connery\u2019s Bond character. While the cat\u2019s fur was shaved off so that he could be painted with blue paint to resemble a black panther, Puss N\u2019 Boots went on to leave a very paw-print on the world!"),mdx("h2",null,"Think Pink: Kitty Shakes Its Tail Feathers In Celebration"),mdx("p",null,"This iconic photograph is often used as a symbol for the LGBTQI community, and it was taken during a celebration held in San Francisco\u2019s Castro district after the announcement that the AIDS virus could not be spread through casual contact. It\u2019s a fantastic image that has been reprinted on posters and T-shirts around the world. It\u2019s definitely a great example of how a single photograph can be used to make a statement."),mdx("h2",null,"Garfield Is Everywhere (and That\u2019s A Good Thing)"),mdx("p",null,"This image depicts the moment when the cartoon character Garfield\u2019s eyes were first drawn. While the photo is nothing more than a scribbled outline of a cat\u2019s face, it is still one of the most famous cat photos in history. We love Garfield as much as anyone, but this photograph does raise an interesting point. Cats are such mysterious creatures that a photograph of a scribble can become an iconic image!"),mdx("h2",null,"Kitten On Fire: You Can Never Forget Your First Burn"),mdx("p",null,"This image has been shared across the internet many times over, and for good reason. It shows a kitten who is blissfully unaware of the smoke surrounding him as he lies on a piece of smoldering fabric. While it is cute to look at this kitten, it is important to remember that the fabric could cause severe burns. Many have been inspired to learn first aid techniques as a result of this photo."),mdx("h2",null,"Meow-chy Baby: Hello Kitty Grows Up"),mdx("p",null,"This image shows the iconic Hello Kitty with a newly mature appearance. It was taken at a special Hello Kitty event in Japan that featured many of the franchise\u2019s characters as they appeared in the past, present, and future. It\u2019s a huge photo that shows the power of Hello Kitty, and it goes to show that a single image can have a massive impact on the world!"),mdx("h2",null,"Final Words"),mdx("p",null,"We hope that you\u2019ve enjoyed reading through our list of the top 10 most iconic cat photos of all time. As you can see, a lot of these photos were taken during very significant moments in history, which really goes to show how a single image can become a lasting symbol for all time."),mdx("p",null,"And remember, even if you haven\u2019t yet snapped a picture as iconic as these, you never know who or what it might be! If you\u2019re a cat owner, then you\u2019re definitely in prime position to take the next great cat photo."),mdx("p",null,"So get snapping, and who knows? Your cat photo could be the next one on the top 10 list!"))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: How to Train Your Dog to Sit
The Top 10 Funniest Cat Videos on Youtube

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Why do crazy cat people love their cats so much? Because their cats are hilarious. With their constant sneering and condescending glares, feline friends have a knack for being entertaining in the most ridiculous ways. So, if you need a break from those stressful final exam cram sessions, we've compiled a list of the top 10 funniest cat videos on YouTube. From silly cats to crafty cats and everything in between, these videos will give you some much-needed LOLs.
Cat videos are one of the most popular video niches online today. There are several channels on YouTube that are dedicated only to cat videos and nothing else. In this post we\u2019ll look at some of the best channels that feature nothing but cat content \u2013 be it funny cat vines or cute cat compilations \u2013 as well as some of our favorite individual clips from these creators.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: How to Train Your Dog to Walk on a Leash
How to Deal with a Partner Who's Always Busy
How to Deal with a Partner Who's Always Working

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...o}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...o,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Working too much is a problem many people struggle with \u2014 but it\u2019s even more challenging when you\u2019re in a relationship with someone who has the same work ethic. If your partner usually leaves for work before you even get out of bed, or isn\u2019t home until after you\u2019re already in bed, things can get tricky.
Working from home, flexible hours and remote working are all buzzwords in today\u2019s labor market. Companies are becoming increasingly aware that it isn\u2019t just about how much time employees spend at the desk but also about what they achieve during that time. A Gallup poll found that telecommuting or working from home is growing in popularity among professionals across most industries. Working remotely makes it easier to find jobs, negotiate schedules and live without a commute.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: How the Pandemic Is Changing the Way We Work

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...n}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...n,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`Time is money, as the saying goes. And when you\u2019re grappling with pandemic disease and a global outbreak, time spent at work has a whole different set of implications.
Pandemic flu strains have decimated human populations since the first recorded pandemic in 541 AD. Over the centuries, outbreaks have been frequent enough to instill fear in even the most stoic among us.
Today we face another pandemic threat with the potential to be even more devastating than those which came before it. A highly virulent strain of influenza A virus known as influenza pandemia has begun spreading rapidly throughout much of the world.
In many ways, today\u2019s workplace is very different from that of a century ago. Technology has advanced; office structures are more open and collaborative; and workers are expected to demonstrate self-motivation and flexibility in order to thrive in an ever-changing workplace environment.`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: 10 Easy Tips for Sticking to Your New Year's Resolutions

intro.compiledSource: const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,"New Year\u2019s resolutions are like a clean slate for the coming year. What you do with that opportunity is up to you. Maybe you resolve to eat healthier, exercise more or reduce stress and anxiety. Maybe you decide to learn a new skill, read more books, help others or travel more. Or maybe your resolution is to do something completely different \u2014 like learn a language, stop procrastinating or read the complete works of Shakespeare. The possibilities are endless, but sticking to those resolutions can be challenging. The key is establishing habits that will last all 365 days of the year and not just one crazy day in January. It takes small but deliberate changes in everyday life that add up over time and become second nature. Here are 10 easy tips for sticking to your New Year\u2019s resolutions:"))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: How to Get Out of a Style Rut

intro.compiledSource: const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,"The risk of falling into a style rut is something we all have to deal with from time to time. It happens to even the most confident and daring of people, so you\u2019re certainly not alone if you feel like your style is stagnating and you can\u2019t think of anything new or exciting to wear. Whether it\u2019s because you haven\u2019t found a new piece of clothing that excites you in months, or because you just don\u2019t know what to wear after wearing variations on the same theme for several weeks in a row, everyone gets stuck in a rut now and again. Thankfully there are ways to get out of it and discover a new lease on your personal style once again."))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

relatedArticles.title: The Top 10 Greatest Cat Moments in History

intro.compiledSource:
const layoutProps={},MDXLayout="wrapper";function MDXContent({components:e,...t}){return mdx(MDXLayout,{...layoutProps,...t,components:e,mdxType:"MDXLayout"},mdx("p",null,`So you think your cat is cute, and that\u2019s a wonderful thing. After all, cats are fluffy and adorable creatures who also happen to be natural stress relievers. But do you think your cat is cute enough to make it into the history books? Probably not. Sorry to burst your bubble, but even the cutest cat in the world would struggle to compete with some of these feline friends when it comes to making an impact on human history...
Cats have been a constant companion of humans for thousands of years. They\u2019re enigmatic creatures with a reputation for being aloof and independent; they don\u2019t ask for much and they keep very little as repayment. But cats demand something intangible from their owners: companionship. As a result, there are many famous cats in history whose exploits have become the stuff of legend\u2026`))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;
